item.title: ERF Plus - Anstoß Gottes wesentliche Eigenschaft
item.description: Gedanken von Horst Kretschi zum Bibeltext Jona 3,1-10. (Autor: Horst Kretschi) Feed: https://feedpress.me/erf-plus-podcast

item.title: What's Wrong with Mindfulness?
item.description: What’s is wrong with mindfulness? Where does the idea of mindfulness even come from? How can we best use eastern ideas around meditation in our western lives? R. John Williams is a professor of English and film and media studies at Yale University. He is the author of The Buddha in the Machine: Art, Technology, and the Meeting of East and West (2014), and of the forthcoming volume Out of Mind: A Media-Theoretical Critique of Meditation. Feed: https://flux.community/podcasts/all-shows/resources/xml/flux.xml
